rules.ruleDescription: B hold -> Search menu apps / Skim note
N hold -> New note / Skim highlight
LCMD - left  (tap), return to last app (tap-tap), switcher (tap-tap-hold)
ESCAPE - ESC (tap), Process Spy (tap-tap), kill unresponsive apps (tap-tap-hold)
CAPS - HSLAUNCHER (alone), HYPER (hold), SUPER (with shift), MEH (with ctrl)
SPACE - tap for space, hold for layer
RCMD + Key - App launch or focus
